trans-unit.source: The recycler offers the possibility to restore deleted records or remove them from the database permanently. These actions can be applied to a single record, multiple records, and recursively to child records (ex. restoring a page can restore all content elements on that page). Filtering by page and by table provides a quick overview of deleted records before taking action on them.
trans-unit.target: Papirkurven giver mulighed for at gendanne slettede elementer, eller for at slette dem permanent fra databasen. Det er muligt at slette enkelte elementer, flere elementer eller rekursivt (f.eks. kan gendannelse af en side gendanne samtlige indholdselementer på siden samtidigt). Filtrering på sideniveau eller tabel giver et hurtigt overblik over slettede elementer før det foretages sletning eller gendannelse.
